post:
Hello,
We've got a new node in North Carolina and here's our new offer, also do note, these will be provisioned only on our North Carolina Node and not on the Kansas node.

All the VPS's come with,
1 Gbit Shared Line
Dedicated RAM 
8 Shared Cores of 2 X L5420 Processors at 2.50 Ghz each core.
1 Static IPv4

OpenVZ Yearly Plan Details :
256 MB Guaranteed RAM
512 MB vSWAP
20 GB HDD
1 TB Bandwidth
8 Shared Cores of 2 X L5420 Processors at 2.50 Ghz each core (Each processor has 4 cores, so 2 x 4 = 8)

Order Link :
https://crowncloud.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=18

Test File : http://199.241.185.250/100mb.test
Test IP : 199.241.185.250
Location : North Carolina, USA
